name: Re:Reloading
description:
FULL SCREEN WORKS A LOT BETTER PRESS R TO RELOAD

This is a shooter where you ammo is randomized by a dice roll and how much ammo is seen by how many dots are filled in, you reload pressing r and shoot by holding click and move by wasd and arrow keys. In the top left is how much health you have which also corrosponsed to what numbers you can roll. E.G if you take a hit you now have 1 less health and you cannot roll the the lowest number you used to have. So if you take a hit youre more likely to roll higher but at the cost of lower HP. You gain full health every level.
